name: RetinalDetachmentWithRetinalDefect
title: Retinal Detachment with Retinal Defect
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of retinal detachment with a retinal defect.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of various types of retinal detachments.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to 'unspecified eye.')
